title: Moonscars
description: Refine your combat skills and master new abilities to navigate through the nonlinear world of Moonscars. Confront the relentless darkness that seeks to annihilate you. In Moonscars, each death is a learned lesson, and with every trial overcome, new truths will be unveiled.

title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2
description: Explore the vast Chornobyl Exclusion Zone, teeming with dangerous foes, deadly anomalies, and potent artifacts. Unfold your own epic tale as you journey to the Heart of Chornobyl. Choose wisely, for your decisions will shape your fate in the end.

title: Sherlock Holmes
description: Embark on a chilling Lovecraftian journey with revamped graphics and gameplay. Step into the shoes of Sherlock Holmes to delve into eerie disappearances across Europe and the US.

title: Bosorka
description: Bosorka is an exciting action roguelike where a young witch saves the world from insidious and cruel demons. Combine runes, master a variety of brooms, and try all possible and impossible spells until you gain enough power to fight evil.
